title: Main Toplaner/Jungler looking for Team EUW Plat + Ger/Eng
body:
Hi guys im looking for a Team that wanna play Tournaments and Teamranked (reaching Diamond atleast).

Im from Germany but my english skills are pretty good.

im 25 Years old, u should be the same arround 18+ only.

im playing since Season 1 ends.

Season 2: 1600 Elo, Season 3: Plat V , Season 4: Plat 3 Season 5: Plat 1, Season 6 Plat v atm

My main Toplaners are : {{champion:2}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:98}} 

main Junglers are: {{champion:421}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:64}} 

im learning atm: {{champion:84}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:78}} 

i like to play as a Teamfight Toplaner/Jungler so im looking for good Mid/botlane Carrys, i can play Carrys aswell but i like Bruisers more.

what i want from u:

be able to Laneswap, having a Shootcaller if u want me for Toplaner, if im Jungling for u i want to do the Calls.

u are Playing longer as 3-4 Months together so no new team.

U need the Basic Knowledge´s of League i dont wanna teach u how to play League.

i wanna Reach atleast Diamond 3 this Season u and ur mates Should have the same Goal as me or Higher.

Dont add me if u or ur mates are below Plat.

feel free to Add me ingame :)
